about_the_game:
Welcome to the realm of the Isles!

Farming Isles is an isometric farming simulator where you are in control of designing optimal crop growth for maximum profit. Each Isle is configured to have its own set of perks that differ from one another. Construct the Farming Isles however you wish.

GAMEPLAY

Here you will experience what it takes to keep a sustainable farm functioning by living in the realm of the Isles.

  • Build the Isles of your choice
    With an assortment of different Isle types, each with a different layout offering varying aesthetics, support for specific structure types, and resources.

  • Sell your investments
    Sometimes the desired placement or use-case of a structure is no longer needed.

  • Use the right tool for the right job

    Available for usage, each tool has its own use where no tool is alike. Access the tools via the Toolbar.

  • The market is dynamic

    With fluctuation for products in demand, the market updates the prices they will buy your goods for. Sometimes they'll want something a little more.

  • The thieving syndicate is ready

    Watch out for The Vermins! They want everything you got and won't stop till they've achieved it. Be on the look out for them to stop their advancements, otherwise you'll be paying for it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual core 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or comparable (or anything newer)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The older the hardware decreases performance. Ideal to have hardware closer to the recommended specs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad core 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or comparable (or anything newer)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure to have the latest graphics drivers installed

short_description: A relaxing farming simulator game that has the player focusing on resource management by maintaining crops growing, watering farmland, building additional structures for extending the stock.
